definition: wife or senior concubine of husbands older brother (old)/elder sister (old)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
Baosi, concubine of King You of Zhou 周幽王[Zhou1 You1 wang2] and one of the famous Chinese beauties
Si Wenming, personal name of Yu the Great 大禹[Da4 Yu3]

sentences.english: The sixth was Gasi married to road divinity.
sentences.chinese: 第六個是嫁給路神的嘎姒。

sentences.english: The smart Nuosi was the eighth married.
sentences.chinese: 聰明的諾姒第八個出嫁。

sentences.english: “I have never smiled so far, ” the Queen replied.
sentences.chinese: 褒姒說道，我從來不笑也沒有什麼能讓我笑的。

definition: surname Cheng/Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BCE) vassal state
old variant of 贏|赢[ying2], to win, to profit/old variant of 盈[ying2], full
one of the five legendary emperors, also called 高辛氏[Gao1 xin1 shi4]
surname Yao/Yao or Tang Yao (c. 2200 BC), one of Five legendary Emperors 五帝[wu3 di4], second son of Di Ku 帝嚳|帝喾[Di4 Ku4]
a legendary beauty who flew to the moon/the lady in the moon
